step.datasource: SELECT TOP 50 CostPriceCurrency_DE as CostPriceCurrency , CostPriceStandard_DE as CostPriceStandard , SalesPackagePrice_DE as SalesPackagePrice , SalesPrice_DE as SalesPrice , Condition_ESE as Condition , UserField_02_483 AS UserField_02 , UserField_03_483 AS UserField_03 , UserField_04_483 AS UserField_04 , UserNumber_13_483 AS UserNumber_13 , i.* FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Items_Export i WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Items ig WITH (NOLOCK) ON ig.ItemCode = i.ItemCode WHERE i.ESE_sysmodified > ig.sysmodified -- modified OR (ig.Condition = 'A' and i.Condition_ESE <> 'A') OR (ig.Condition = 'A' AND i.costpricestandard_DE IS NOT NULL AND ABS(ROUND(ISNULL(ig.costpricestandard,0) - i.CostPriceStandard_DE,3)) > 0.001 ) OR (i.SalesPackagePrice_DE IS NOT NULL AND ABS(ROUND(ISNULL(ig.SalesPackagePrice,0)- ISNULL(i.SalesPackagePrice_DE,0),2)) > 0.01 ) ORDER BY i.Itemcode

SELECT top 100 percent CostPriceCurrency_DE as CostPriceCurrency , CostPriceStandard_DE as CostPriceStandard , SalesPackagePrice_DE as SalesPackagePrice , SalesPrice_DE as SalesPrice , Condition_ESE as Condition , GLAccountDistribution_NEW AS GLAccountDistribution , UserField_02_483 AS UserField_02 , UserField_03_483 AS UserField_03 , UserField_04_483 AS UserField_04 , i.* FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Items_Export i WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Items ig WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ig.ItemCode = i.ItemCode) AND (i.Condition_ESE = 'A' OR i.Condition_ESE = 'F') --- Only create active or future items

SELECT ItemCode, 'B' AS Condition, CASE WHEN TextDescription IS NULL THEN '' ELSE TextDescription + ' ' END + '[' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(),105) + '] ' + 'Item blocked because it does not exists in Synergy' AS TextDescription FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.items WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ItemCode NOT IN (SELECT ItemCode FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Items_Export) and Condition <> 'B' AND (TYPE = 'S' OR Type = 'B')

SELECT cg.cmp_wwn as AccountCode, cg.crdnr, ig.ItemCode, i.PurchaseCurrency, i.PurchasePrice FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Items_Export i WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Items ig WITH (NOLOCK) ON ig.ItemCode = i.ItemCode INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.crdnr = i.lev_crdnr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT WHERE 1=1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.ItemAccounts iag WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE iag.crdnr = cg.crdnr AND iag.AccountCode = cg.cmp_wwn AND iag.ItemCode = ig.ItemCode) AND ig.IsPurchaseItem = 1

SELECT TOP 50 ia.id, ia.AccountCode, ia.crdnr, ia.ItemCode, i.PurchaseCurrency, i.PurchasePrice FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Items_Export i WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.ItemAccounts ia WITH (NOLOCK) ON ia.ItemCode = i.ItemCode and ia.crdnr = i.lev_crdnr collate database_default INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Items ig WITH (NOLOCK) ON ig.ItemCode = i.ItemCode WHERE ig.condition = 'A' AND i.PurchasePrice IS NOT NULL AND (ia.PurchasePrice IS NULL OR ia.PurchaseCurrency <> i.PurchaseCurrency collate database_default OR ABS(ROUND(ISNULL(ia.PurchasePrice,0) - i.PurchasePrice,3)) > 0.001 ) ORDER BY ia.Itemcode

SELECT TOP 1000 CostPriceCurrency_US as CostPriceCurrency , CostPriceStandard_US as CostPriceStandard , CONVERT(DECIMAL(8,2),CASE WHEN ISNULL(ig.UserNumber_12,0) > 0 THEN ig.UserNumber_12 ELSE i.SalesPackagePrice_US END) as SalesPackagePrice -- USE default USD price , CONVERT(DECIMAL(8,2),CASE WHEN ISNULL(ig.UserNumber_12,0) > 0 THEN ig.UserNumber_12 ELSE i.SalesPrice_US END) as SalesPrice , CASE WHEN ig.Condition = 'B' THEN ig.Condition ELSE i.Condition_ESE END AS Condition , UserNumber_13_484 as UserNumber_13 , i.* FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Items_Export i WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Items ig WITH (NOLOCK) ON ig.ItemCode = i.ItemCode -- Globe WHERE i.ESE_sysmodified > ig.sysmodified -- modified OR (ig.Condition = 'A' and i.Condition_ESE <> 'A') OR (ig.Condition = 'A' AND i.CostPriceStandard_US IS NOT NULL AND ABS(ROUND(ISNULL(ig.costpricestandard,0) - i.CostPriceStandard_US,3)) > 0.001 ) OR (ABS (CASE WHEN ISNULL(ig.UserNumber_12,0) > 0 THEN ig.UserNumber_12 ELSE ISNULL(i.SalesPackagePrice_US,0) END - ISNULL(ig.SalesPackagePrice,0)) > 0.01 )
ORDER BY i.Itemcode

SELECT TOP 100 percent CostPriceCurrency_US as CostPriceCurrency , CostPriceStandard_US as CostPriceStandard , SalesPackagePrice_US as SalesPackagePrice , SalesPrice_US as SalesPrice , Condition_US_NEW as Condition , GLAccountDistribution_NEW AS GLAccountDistribution , i.* FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Items_Export i WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Items ig WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ig.ItemCode = i.ItemCode) AND (i.Condition_ESE = 'A' OR i.Condition_ESE = 'F') --- Only create active or future items

SELECT ItemCode, 'B' AS Condition, Condition, CASE WHEN TextDescription IS NULL THEN '' ELSE TextDescription + ' ' END + '[' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(),105) + '] ' + 'Item blocked because it does not exists in Synergy' AS TextDescription
FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.items WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ItemCode NOT IN (SELECT ItemCode FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Items_Export) and Condition <> 'B' and (Type = 'S' OR Type = 'B')

SELECT cg.cmp_wwn as AccountCode, cg.crdnr, ig.ItemCode,i.PurchaseCurrency,i.PurchasePrice FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Items_Export i WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Items ig WITH (NOLOCK) ON ig.ItemCode = i.ItemCode INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy cg WITH (NOLOCK) ON cg.crdnr = i.lev_crdnr COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT WHERE 1=1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.ItemAccounts iag WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE iag.crdnr = cg.crdnr AND iag.AccountCode = cg.cmp_wwn AND iag.ItemCode = ig.ItemCode) AND ig.IsPurchaseItem = 1

SELECT TOP 50 ia.id, ia.AccountCode, ia.crdnr, ia.ItemCode, i.PurchaseCurrency, i.PurchasePrice FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Items_Export i WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.ItemAccounts ia WITH (NOLOCK) ON ia.ItemCode = i.ItemCode and ia.crdnr = i.lev_crdnr collate database_default INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Items ig WITH (NOLOCK) ON ig.ItemCode = i.ItemCode WHERE ig.condition = 'A' AND i.PurchasePrice IS NOT NULL AND (ia.PurchasePrice IS NULL OR ia.PurchaseCurrency <> i.PurchaseCurrency collate database_default OR ABS(ROUND(ISNULL(ia.PurchasePrice,0) - i.PurchasePrice,3)) > 0.001 ) ORDER BY ia.Itemcode

UPDATE [484].dbo.Items SET CSPickITScanCode = i.CSPickITScanCode FROM [400].dbo.Items i WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [484].dbo.Items i2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON i2.ItemCode = i.ItemCode WHERE ISNULL(i.CSPickITScanCode, '') != ISNULL(i2.CSPickITScanCode, '')

SELECT TOP 50 CostPriceCurrency_DE as CostPriceCurrency , CostPriceStandard_DE as CostPriceStandard , SalesPackagePrice_DE as SalesPackagePrice , SalesPrice_DE as SalesPrice , Condition_ESE as Condition , UserField_02_483 AS UserField_02 , UserField_03_483 AS UserField_03 , UserField_04_483 AS UserField_04 , i.* FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Items_Export i WITH (NOLOCK) -- Globe INNER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Items ig WITH (NOLOCK) ON ig.ItemCode = i.ItemCode WHERE i.ESE_sysmodified > ig.sysmodified -- modified OR (ig.Condition = 'A' and i.Condition_ESE <> 'A') OR (ig.Condition = 'A' AND i.costpricestandard_DE IS NOT NULL AND ABS(ROUND(ISNULL(ig.costpricestandard,0) - i.CostPriceStandard_DE,3)) > 0.001 ) OR (ig.Condition = 'A' AND i.SalesPackagePrice_DE IS NOT NULL AND ISNULL(ig.SalesPackagePrice,0) <> i.SalesPackagePrice_DE) ORDER BY i.Itemcode

SELECT top 100 percent CostPriceCurrency_DE as CostPriceCurrency , CostPriceStandard_DE as CostPriceStandard , SalesPackagePrice_DE as SalesPackagePrice , SalesPrice_DE as SalesPrice , Condition_ESE as Condition , GLAccountDistribution_NEW AS GLAccountDistribution , UserField_02_483 AS UserField_02 , UserField_03_483 AS UserField_03 , UserField_04_483 AS UserField_04 , i.* FROM dbo._AB_vw_ESE_Sync_Items_Export i WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.Items ig WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ig.ItemCode = i.ItemCode) AND (i.Condition_ESE = 'A' OR i.Condition_ESE = 'F') --- Only create active or future items

select i.itemcode, convert(int,i.UserNumber_01) as UserNumber_13 from [%abeisourcedb%]..items i with (NOLOCK) inner join [%abeitargetdb%]..items ii with (NOLOCK) on ii.ItemCode = i.ItemCode where i.UserNumber_01 <> ii.UserNumber_13
